title: 22: S6E22 – "Knifepoint Reprisal" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you three spine-chilling tales from author Soren Narnia, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about mysterious music, headless horrors, and educational atrocities.
